content: Implement RichNotificationManager and NotificationChannelManager for Android with support for images, actions, and progress notifications
reason: User requested T3 Rich Notifications Android implementation

content: Created test files for both managers. Tests require connected Android device or emulator to run. Test files include comprehensive coverage of: channel creation, rich notifications with images, progress notifications, action buttons, and cancellation.

Coil dependency already present in wakeveApp/build.gradle.kts (io.coil-kt:coil-compose:2.6.0). No additional dependencies required. POST_NOTIFICATIONS permission already declared in AndroidManifest.xml.
